title: Murder by the Book
description: Mystery writer Ken Franklin kills his partner to become the sole beneficiary of their lucrative book series. Lieutenant Columbo must prove that the seemingly perfect murder was anything but.

title: Death Lends a Hand
description: A private investigator murders the wife of a client after she rebuffs his advances. Columbo investigates the seemingly accidental death, finding inconsistencies in the detective's story.

title: Ã‰tude in Black
description: A famous orchestra conductor murders his mistress when she threatens to tell his wife about their affair. Columbo must find proof beyond the conductor's seemingly perfect alibi.

title: Any Old Port in a Storm
description: Wine connoisseur Adrian Carsini kills his brother when he threatens to sell their vineyard. Columbo uses his knowledge of wine and careful observation to trap the murderer. Often cited as one of the best Columbo episodes.

title: Try and Catch Me
description: Mystery novelist Abigail Mitchell kills the man who murdered her niece. In a battle of wits, Columbo matches minds with someone as clever as he is, creating a fascinating psychological duel.

title: The Murder of Sherlock Holmes
description: Jessica Fletcher attends a costume party in New York City to celebrate her first novel, where she becomes embroiled in a real murder investigation. This feature-length pilot introduces viewers to Cabot Cove's favorite mystery writer.

title: Deadly Lady
description: Jessica's niece is arrested for the murder of her employer. Convinced of her innocence, Jessica investigates the victim's glamorous but cutthroat fashion company to find the real killer.

title: Dead Heat
description: At a horse farm, Jessica investigates when a wealthy horse breeder is murdered. The suspects include family members and business partners, all with motives related to the valuable racing stables.

title: Magnum on Ice
description: In this crossover episode, Jessica teams up with Thomas Magnum in Hawaii when a renowned tennis player is murdered. The episode combines the best of both mystery series.

title: J.B. as in Jailbird
description: Jessica is arrested for murder in the Soviet Union while on a book tour. She must prove her innocence from behind bars in a foreign country, using only her wits and powers of observation.

title: The Killings at Badger's Drift
description: When an elderly woman dies in the village of Badger's Drift, her friend is convinced it was murder. DCI Tom Barnaby investigates, uncovering dark secrets in the seemingly idyllic English village. This pilot episode sets the tone for the entire series.

title: Death's Shadow
description: Murders occur at a New Age commune in Midsomer, where spiritual pursuits mask deadly intentions. Barnaby must navigate the world of alternative medicine and meditation to find a killer.

title: Judgement Day
description: A series of murders rock the peaceful village of Midsomer Mallow. Each victim was involved in a controversial decision years earlier, and now someone is exacting revenge.

title: Ring Out Your Dead
description: Bell-ringers in Midsomer parishes are being murdered. Barnaby must investigate the competitive world of campanology (bell-ringing) to stop a killer with a very specific grudge.

title: The Maid in Splendour
description: When a local pub landlord is killed, Barnaby investigates the close-knit community around the historic inn. Ancient feuds and modern greed collide in this atmospheric mystery.
